results.name: Length of longest contiguous block of 1's in binary expansion of n^3.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: A038374(n) = { if(n<2, return(n)); n>>=valuation(n, 2); if(n<2, return(n)); my(e=valuation(n+1, 2)); max(e, A038374(n>>e)); } \\ After _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 12 2014
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 20 2003
